  • Constructor Details

    • InputReader

      public InputReader()

  • Method Details

    • run

      public void run()
      Continuously reads user input from the terminal until the input stream is closed. Each input line is processed using the handleInput method.
      Specified by:
      run in interface Runnable

    • handleInput

      private void handleInput(String input, org.jline.reader.LineReader reader)
      Processes a given user input and executes the corresponding command by interacting with the server and client model.
      Parameters:
      input - the input string entered by the user, which contains the command and its arguments.
      reader - the LineReader instance used to read additional input when prompted for command arguments.

    • renderShips

      private void renderShips()
      Renders the ships of all players in the game and displays them in the terminal. Marks the current state as viewing ships.

    • renderHome

      private void renderHome()
      Renders the home view of the game interface.

    • helper

      private void helper()
      Displays a comprehensive list of available commands grouped by their respective categories. It includes commands for lobby management, building phase, adventure cards, and miscellaneous actions. The method outputs a description of each command along with its purpose or required parameters.

    • stopInputReader

      private void stopInputReader()
      Stops the input reader by marking the standard input as closed and attempting to close the associated terminal resource. This method sets the `stdinClosed` flag to true to indicate that no further input is expected. It then attempts to close the `terminal` resource to release any associated system resources. Any exceptions encountered during the terminal closure are ignored.

    • getCommandsCompleter

      private org.jline.reader.Completer getCommandsCompleter()
      Reads a JSON file containing a list of command strings, deserializes it into a list, and returns a Completer instance initialized with these commands.
      Returns:
      a Completer that provides autocompletion functionality for the commands listed in the JSON file.

    • getTerminal

      public org.jline.terminal.Terminal getTerminal()
      Retrieves the terminal associated with this input reader.
      Returns:
      the Terminal instance used by this input reader.

    • getReader

      public org.jline.reader.LineReader getReader()
      Retrieves the LineReader instance associated with this input reader.
      Returns:
      the LineReader instance used for reading input.
